result.execSummary:
The defendant Detrick J Smith was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Resisting, Obstructing, Hindering. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Detrick J Smith

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Detrick J Smith in court with attorney Thomas K Hackbart.  Defendant Detrick J Smith in custody.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for motion hearing. 

AS TO COUNT 1:

On motion of the State, Court ordered charge amended to Resisting or Obstructing, contrary to County ordinance section 63.05(2),, a Class forfeiture.

Defendant enters a plea of guilty. Court found the Defendant guilty. Court orders Defendant to pay a forfeiture of $100.00 including costs to be paid by 08-12-016 or Civil Judgment.

Attorney Thomas K. Hackbart in court, defendant Detrick J Smith not in court, in custody.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for motion hearing. For reasons stated on the record, Court ordered case adjourned for motion hearing in Branch 31. All parties are notified that effective 12-1-15 this case will be assigned to Reserve Judge, Branch 31, in Room 615 of the Courthouse.  
  Motion hearing scheduled for February 12, 2016 at 08:30 am.
-To Suppress Investigatory Stop of Defendant And Subsequent Arrest of Defendant from Attorney Thomas Hackbart on behalf of his client; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defendant Detrick J Smith in court with attorney Thomas K. Hackbart.  Defendant Detrick J Smith in custody.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea. Defense counsel requests motion hearing. Any and all motions are to be filed with the court by October 1, 2015. State's response: November 2, 2015. Court ordered case adjourned for motion hearing in Branch 37.  Motion hearing scheduled for November 20, 2015 at 10:00 am.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT PRODUCED FOR NEXT SCHEDULED HEARING.

Attorney Thomas K. Hackbart in court, defendant Detrick J Smith not in court, in custody at Racine Youthful Offender Correctional Institute and not produced.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendered for calendar call / projected guilty plea and sentencing. Court ordered stayed warrant lifted as defendant was in custody on July 23, 2015 at 1:30 p.m.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea hearing scheduled for September 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Thomas K. Hackbart in court.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. For reasons stated on the record,   Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until next scheduled hearing.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 7, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Atty Hackbart unable to apppear in court today due to an illness.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.

Attorney Thomas K. Hackbart in court, defendant Detrick J. Smith not in court, in custody.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case calendared for a Status of Counsel Conference.
Defense counsel has received discovery and offer.  
Court ordered case adjourned for pretrial conference in Branch 37.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 1, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered all conditions to remain in effect.

Defendant Detrick J Smith in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  Defendant Detrick J Smith in custody at MSDF.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defense motion to withdraw as counsel is granted by the court. Defense counsel will notify Public Defender's Office to appoint new counsel for the defendant.  Case adjourned for status of counsel in branch 37.  Status conference scheduled for May 12, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Michael B Plaisted in court. Defendant Detrick J Smith not in court in custody, not produced.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Deputy Court Clerk: tmk.
Defense counsel requesting motion hearing to withdraw as counsel.  Court ordered case adjourned for motion hearing in Branch 37.  Motion hearing scheduled for April 8, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Michael B Plaisted in court, defendant Detrick J. Smith not in court, in custody, not produced.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: tmk.
Case set for return on warrant.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37.  Status conference scheduled for March 31, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Michael Plaisted contacted the Court to schedule return on warrant, defendant in custody at time warrant ordered.   Case is adjourned for return on bench warrant in Branch 37 on March 23, 2015 at 8:30 a.m.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($250.00 signature bond) ad
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 250.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Michael B Plaisted in court prior to case being called.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for status conference. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered Bench Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.

Attorney Michael B Plaisted in court, defendant Detrick J Smith not in court, in custody and not produced.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Defense counsel has received discovery and offer, additional time for review. Defendant has a VOP hold. Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37. Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Status conference scheduled for March 2, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings. Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Detrick J Smith in court with attorney Terese M. Dick.  Defendant Detrick J Smith in custody.  Marissa Luz Santiago appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  HP
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
